about_the_game:
Lewd Guest is a visual novel about a guy who lost his job. Eventually, he can't afford to rent his apartment anymore and is forced to move out, but gladly his ex-colleague Steve invites him to live in his apartment until our hero finds a new job.

He accepts the offer and moves to his ex-colleague's apartment, but as it turns out Steve doesn't live alone. He has a girlfriend named Chloe, who turns out to be a very beautiful woman who has a lot of things in common with the hero. And for some reason Steve is completely okay with them being alone together while he goes to work.

Will he accept the upcoming changes in his relationship with Chloe, or will he break up with her and let you to be together - depends on your choices...
